sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>horse</radical> goes to his favorite <radical>district</radical> to <kanji>gallop</kanji> around. This district has lots of cool buildings and lights to look at, so this horse loves to gallop around there.
meaningInfo: Hear the horse clip clopping around the district as it continues to gallop. Clip clop, clop clip clop!
readingMnemonic: Then the horse <kanji>gallop</kanji>s into the road and gets hit by a <reading>ca</reading>r (<ja>か</ja>). Oh man, there’s blood everywhere. This horse is never going to gallop again. That car totally destroyed it.
readingInfo: The tires screech, the horse neighs, BAM! Total destruction everywhere. Bystanders scream in horror. That horse will never gallop again. It’s a sad day for all horsekind.
